resources.string: ElWeather app provides detailed forecast using openweathermap.org API. The app provides the current temperature in the Philippines in Celsius. It provides sunny, cloudy, rainy and windy condition in every 3 hours interval within the range of 5 days. It helps to track weather forecasts in the Philippines and current conditions in real-time. Users can check on the weather anytime and anywhere using data or internet connection.
ElWeather was developed with love for 7 hours and 30 minutes last September 3, 2022.
